A. Packages
```{r setup, results='hide', message=FALSE}
library(GenomicSEM)
library(here)
```

B. Directory setup
```{r setup_dir}
mlma_chr.dir <- here("munge_sumstats/mlma_files_wchr")
ref.dir <- here("munge_sumstats/munge_refs")
```

C. run 'sumstats()'
```{r}
files <- list.files(mlma_chr.dir, full.names = TRUE)
trait_names <- c("a_indiff0", "b_indiff2", "c_indiff4", "d_indiff8", "e_indiff16", "f_indiff24")
se.logit <- c(F, F, F, F, F, F)
allrefs <- list.files(ref.dir, full.names = TRUE)
selected_ref <- allrefs[2]

SUMSTATSoutput_dd <- sumstats(files=files, ref = selected_ref, trait.names = trait_names, se.logit = se.logit, maf.filter = 0)

# Save the results
save(SUMSTATSoutput_dd, file="SUMSTATSoutput_dd.RData")
```
